price: Tukayaziba masikio yao kuwalaza humo pangoni kwa muda wa miaka kadhaa wa kadhaa.
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا
footnotes: Tukaipokea dua yao hiyo, tukawalaza kwa salama katika hilo pango kwa muda wa miaka kadhaa wa kadhaa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
